title: ICE: `No bound vars found for HirId`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust #![feature(non_lifetime_binders)] pub fn bar() where for V: IntoIterator { } fn main() { bar(); } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.72.0-dev binary: rustc commit-hash: unknown commit-date: unknown host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.72.0-dev LLVM version: 16.0.5 ``` ### Error output ``` error[E0412]: cannot find type `V` in this scope --> 5C8E6DFB90049D1ED2C38FC6320AD5DA73701B5AFC252FFE8FE74BB826CA50CE.rs:6:4 | 6 | }> V: IntoIterator | ^ not found in this scope | help: you might be missing a type parameter | 2 | pub fn bar() | +++ ```
Backtrace

``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/context.rs:2289:21: No bound vars found for HirId(DefId(0:3 ~ 5C8E6DFB90049D1ED2C38FC6320AD5DA73701B5AFC252FFE8FE74BB826CA50CE[127a]::bar).9) (expr `||`) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/37998ab508d5d9fa0d465d7b535dc673087dda8f/compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1650:9 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f10e616cc41 - For more information about an error, try `rustc --explain E0412`. ```
